name: binderize
description: Allow normal functions to work with Function Bind Syntax

scripts.build:umd: webpack src/index.js dist/binderize.js --display-modules --progress && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/binderize.min.js --display-modules --progress
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-examples: npm run build:umd; for i in `ls -d examples/*/`; do pushd $i; webpack; popd; done

author: Adam Nalisnick
